name: It's Raining Boulders!
description:
This is a vertical racing game that is best played with other people and in full screen mode. It can also be played single-player, but it's much more fun with a second or third player.

Everything in this game except is original and created entirely from scratch during a 3-day game jam hosted by Game Gen, except for the music, which was created roughly a month earlier. The theme of the jam was "Don't Stop Moving," with a twist to restrict color usage to an 8-color palette from LOSPEC. This game uses the following color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/greyt-bit
